00013 static Resource *channels = NULL;
00014 
00015 const UINT32 AnalogChannel::kAccumulatorSlot;
00016 const UINT32 AnalogChannel::kAccumulatorNumChannels;
00017 const UINT32 AnalogChannel::kAccumulatorChannels[] = {1, 2};
00018 
00022 void AnalogChannel::InitChannel(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00023 {
00024     Resource::CreateResourceObject(&channels, kAnalogModules * kAnalogChannels);
00025     CheckAnalogModule(slot);
00026     CheckAnalogChannel(slot);
00027     channels->Allocate(AnalogModule::SlotToIndex(slot) * kAnalogModules + channel - 1);
00028     m_channel = channel;
00029     m_module = AnalogModule::GetInstance(slot);
00030     if (IsAccumulatorChannel())
00031     {
00032         m_accumulator = new tAccumulator(channel - 1, &status);
00033         m_accumulatorOffset=0;
00034     }
00035     else
00036     {
00037         m_accumulator = NULL;
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00047 AnalogChannel::AnalogChannel(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00048 {
00049     InitChannel(slot, channel);
00050 }
00051 
00057 AnalogChannel::AnalogChannel(UINT32 channel)
00058 {
00059     InitChannel(GetDefaultAnalogModule(), channel);
00060 }
00061 
00065 AnalogChannel::~AnalogChannel()
00066 {
00067     channels->Free(AnalogModule::SlotToIndex(GetSlot()) * kAnalogModules + m_channel - 1);
00068 }

00227 bool AnalogChannel::IsAccumulatorChannel()
00228 {
00229     if(m_module->GetSlot() != kAccumulatorSlot) return false;
00230     for (UINT32 i=0; i<kAccumulatorNumChannels; i++)
00231     {
00232         if (m_channel == kAccumulatorChannels[i]) return true;
00233     }
00234     return false;
00235 }
00236 
00240 void AnalogChannel::InitAccumulator()
00241 {
00242     m_accumulatorOffset = 0;
00243     SetAccumulatorCenter(0);
00244     ResetAccumulator();
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00254 void AnalogChannel::SetAccumulatorInitialValue(INT64 initialValue)
00255 {
00256     m_accumulatorOffset = initialValue;
00257 }
00258 
00262 void AnalogChannel::ResetAccumulator()
00263 {
00264     if (m_accumulator == NULL)
00265     {
00266         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00267         return;
00268     }
00269     m_accumulator->strobeReset(&status);
00270     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00271 }
00272 
00283 void AnalogChannel::SetAccumulatorCenter(INT32 center)
00284 {
00285     if (m_accumulator == NULL)
00286     {
00287         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00288         return;
00289     }
00290     m_accumulator->writeCenter(center, &status);
00291     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00292 }
00293 
00297 void AnalogChannel::SetAccumulatorDeadband(INT32 deadband)
00298 {
00299     if (m_accumulator == NULL)
00300     {
00301         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00302         return;
00303     }
00304     m_accumulator->writeDeadband(deadband, &status);
00305     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00306 }

00316 INT64 AnalogChannel::GetAccumulatorValue()
00317 {
00318     if (m_accumulator == NULL)
00319     {
00320         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00321         return 0;
00322     }
00323     INT64 value = m_accumulator->readOutput_Value(&status) + m_accumulatorOffset;
00324     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00325     return value;
00326 }
00327 
00335 UINT32 AnalogChannel::GetAccumulatorCount()
00336 {
00337     status = 0;
00338     if (m_accumulator == NULL)
00339     {
00340         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00341         return 0;
00342     }
00343     UINT32 count = m_accumulator->readOutput_Count(&status);
00344     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00345     return count;
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00358 void AnalogChannel::GetAccumulatorOutput(INT64 *value, UINT32 *count)
00359 {
00360     status = 0;
00361     if (m_accumulator == NULL)
00362     {
00363         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00364         return;
00365     }
00366     if (value == NULL || count == NULL)
00367     {
00368         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00369         return;
00370     }
00371 
00372     tAccumulator::tOutput output = m_accumulator->readOutput(&status);
00373     *value = output.Value + m_accumulatorOffset;
00374     *count = output.Count;
00375     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00376 }
00377 
00383 double AnalogChannel::PIDGet() 
00384 {
00385     return GetAverageValue();
00386 }
